turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need a pick me up. Can I ordr something from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Cinnamon Dolce Latte, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you add whipped cream please with cinnamon a dash of cinnamon on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a grande cinnamon dolce latte, with 2% milk and whipped cream and cinnamon on the top, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Have a good day.
